00049 //
00050 // FieldStatistics
00051 //
00052 // 4 February 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_FIELDSTATISTICS_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_FIELDSTATISTICS_HPP
00057 
00058 namespace indri {
00059   namespace index {
00060     struct FieldStatistics {
00061       FieldStatistics( const std::string& _name, bool numeric )
00062         :
00063         name(_name),
00064         isNumeric(numeric),
00065         totalCount(0),
00066         documentCount(0),
00067         lastDocument(0),
00068         lastCount(0)
00069       {
00070       }
00071 
00072       FieldStatistics( const std::string& _name, bool numeric, INT64 _totalCount, int _documentCount )
00073         :
00074         name(_name),
00075         isNumeric(numeric),
00076         totalCount(_totalCount),
00077         documentCount(_documentCount),
00078         lastDocument(0),
00079         lastCount(0) {
00080       }
00081 
00082       void addOccurrence( int documentID ) {
00083         if( documentID != lastDocument ) {
00084           lastCount = 0;
00085           lastDocument = documentID;
00086           documentCount++;
00087         }
00088 
00089         totalCount++;
00090         lastCount++;
00091       }
00092       
00093       std::string name;
00094       bool isNumeric;
00095       INT64 totalCount;
00096       int documentCount;
00097 
00098       int lastDocument;
00099       int lastCount;
00100     };
00101   }
00102 }
00103 
00104 #endif // INDRI_FIELDSTATISTICS_HPP
